verses.verse: Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a vial <S%H6378><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Is it not <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath anointed <S%H4886><s%> thee to be captain <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his inheritance? <S%H5159><s%>

When thou art departed <S%H1980><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> me today, <S%H3117><s%> then thou shalt find <S%H4672><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> sepulcher <S%H6900><s%> in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> at Zelzah; <S%H6766><s%> and they will say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, The asses <S%H860><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou wentest <S%H1980><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> are found: <S%H4672><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> hath left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H853><s%> the care <S%H1697><s%> of the asses, <S%H860><s%> and sorroweth <S%H1672><s%> for you, saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall I do <S%H6213><s%> for my son? <S%H1121><s%>

Then shalt thou go on <S%H2498><s%> forward <S%H1973><s%> from thence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> and thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the plain <S%H436><s%> of Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> shall meet <S%H4672><s%> thee three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> going up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> God <S%H430><s%> to Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> kids, <S%H1423><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> a bottle <S%H5035><s%> of wine: <S%H3196><s%>

And they will salute <S%H7592><s%> <S%H7965><s%> thee, and give <S%H5414><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> loaves of bread; <S%H3899><s%> which thou shalt receive <S%H3947><s%> of their hands. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

After that <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the garrison <S%H5333><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when thou art come <S%H935><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> that thou shalt meet <S%H6293><s%> a company <S%H2256><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> coming down <S%H3381><s%> from the high place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1116><s%> with a psaltery, <S%H5035><s%> and a tabret, <S%H8596><s%> and a pipe, <S%H2485><s%> and a harp, <S%H3658><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they <S%H1992><s%> shall prophesy: <S%H5012><s%>

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H6743><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and thou shalt prophesy <S%H5012><s%> with them, <S%H5973><s%> and shalt be turned <S%H2015><s%> into another <S%H312><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

And let it be, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H428><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> unto thee, that thou do <S%H6213><s%> as occasion serve <S%H834><s%> <S%H4672><s%> <S%H3027><s%> thee; for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

And thou shalt go down <S%H3381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will come down <S%H3381><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings: <S%H8002><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou tarry, <S%H3176><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee, and show <S%H3045><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> thou shalt do. <S%H6213><s%>

And it was <S%H1961><s%> so, that when he had turned <S%H6437><s%> his back <S%H7926><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H2015><s%> him another <S%H312><s%> heart: <S%H3820><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H428><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> came to pass <S%H935><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And when they came <S%H935><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> to the hill, <S%H1389><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a company <S%H2256><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> met <S%H7125><s%> him; and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and he prophesied <S%H5012><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when all <S%H3605><s%> that knew <S%H3045><s%> him formerly <S%H4480><s%> <S%H865><s%> <S%H8032><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he prophesied <S%H5012><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> then the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that is come <S%H1961><s%> unto the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish? <S%H7027><s%> Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> among the prophets? <S%H5030><s%>

And one <S%H376><s%> of the same place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> But who <S%H4310><s%> is their father? <S%H1><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> it became <S%H1961><s%> a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> among the prophets? <S%H5030><s%>
And when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of prophesying, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5012><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to the high place. <S%H1116><s%>

And Saul's <S%H7586><s%> uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him and to <S%H413><s%> his servant, <S%H5288><s%> Whither <S%H575><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> ye? And he said, <S%H559><s%> To seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> the asses: <S%H860><s%> and when we saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they were no where, <S%H369><s%> we came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Samuel. <S%H8050><s%>
And Saul's <S%H7586><s%> uncle <S%H1730><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto you.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his uncle, <S%H1730><s%> He told us plainly <S%H5046><s%> <S%H5046><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the asses <S%H860><s%> were found. <S%H4672><s%> But of the matter <S%H1697><s%> of the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> spoke, <S%H559><s%> he told <S%H5046><s%> him not. <S%H3808><s%>
And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called the people together <S%H6817><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Mizpeh; <S%H4709><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I <S%H595><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> and of them that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> you:

And ye <S%H859><s%> have this day <S%H3117><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> <S%H853><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> you out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your adversities <S%H7451><s%> and your tribulations; <S%H6869><s%> and ye have said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Nay, but <S%H3588><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us. Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore present yourselves <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and by your thousands. <S%H505><s%>

And when Samuel <S%H8050><s%> had caused <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to come near, <S%H7126><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%>

When he had caused <S%H853><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> to come near <S%H7126><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of Matri <S%H4309><s%> was taken, <S%H3920><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> was taken: <S%H3920><s%> and when they sought <S%H1245><s%> him, he could not <S%H3808><s%> be found. <S%H4672><s%>

Therefore they inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> further, <S%H5750><s%> if the man <S%H376><s%> should yet <S%H5750><s%> come <S%H935><s%> thither. <S%H1988><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> hath hid himself <S%H2244><s%> among <S%H413><s%> the stuff. <S%H3627><s%>

And they ran <S%H7323><s%> and fetched <S%H3947><s%> him thence: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> and when he stood <S%H3320><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he was higher <S%H1361><s%> than any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> from his shoulders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7926><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> See <S%H7200><s%> ye him whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen, <S%H977><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> like him <S%H3644><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the people? <S%H5971><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted, <S%H7321><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> God save <S%H2421><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>

Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the manner <S%H4941><s%> of the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> and wrote <S%H3789><s%> it in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and laid it up <S%H5117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> away, every man <S%H376><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> to Gibeah; <S%H1390><s%> and there went <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him a band of men, <S%H2428><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> hearts <S%H3820><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had touched. <S%H5060><s%>

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Belial <S%H1100><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> shall this <S%H2088><s%> man save <S%H3467><s%> us? And they despised <S%H959><s%> him, and brought <S%H935><s%> him no <S%H3808><s%> presents. <S%H4503><s%> But he held his peace. <S%H2790><s%>
